title: Sim Works and Peace Sports Ramen Outside Ride and Onigiri Party at MADE
content:
SimWorks will have a booth at¬†@made.bike in Portland, OR August 23-25 and will do its first ever Ramen Outside Ride with @peace.sports. Join Sim Works for a ride celebrating the MADE show and riding bikes and all of the amazing people who make it possible.

The Sim Works team will ride from MADE (Zidell Yards) to Washington Park to eat ramen and hang out. Then, they‚Äôll ride to SimWorks HQ to eat some homemade Onigiri to finish the ride and party!

Details:

Saturday, August 24
3:30pm: Meet up at MADE BIKE show (Zidell Yards)
4:00pm: Roll out
Make Ramen outside at Stevens Pavilion Picnic Shelter in Washington Park üçú
6-8pm: End Onigiri Party at SimWorks HQ

Check out more at the Sim Works Instagram.

The post Sim Works and Peace Sports Ramen Outside Ride and Onigiri Party at MADE appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
